name: Cnidarian
description: C compiled WASM with HTML UI and Docker runner #C #WASM #mhn

name: ðŸ–§ Get bplusðŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ï¸ apps
description: grab the bplus series of apps, currently* Cnidarian, streamdlrs-gui, and searchrs(set your keys in .env) #bplus #mhn #install
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs.git && git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui.git && curl -L -o bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs/releases/download/v0.4.1.2/bplus-searchrs && curl -L -o bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui/releases/download/working/bplus-streamdlrs-gui && chmod +x bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs && chmod +x bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui && curl -L -o bplus-streamdlrs-gui/yt-dlp_linux https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/download/2025.11.12/yt-dlp_linux && chmod +x bplus-streamdlrs-gui/yt-dlp_linux && docker pull mrhappynice/cnidarian:latest

name: ðŸ”Ž Launch bplus-searchrs
description: LLM powered web search, built-in and connection to SearXNG #bplus #mhn

name: bplus running apps
command: ps -eo pid,comm | grep bplus && echo "" && echo "Type: pkill <bplus-suffix> ex. pkill searchrs to stop bplus-searchrs"

name: ðŸ–§ Get static llama.cpp vulkan build
description: llama-server vulkan static build for linux #llama #install

name: ðŸ¦™ Run model with llama.cpp server
description: pick your hf model with -hf or local dir with -m #llama

name: ðŸ–§ Get Life Manager
description: dl lifeman app from mhn github, #install #life
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman.git && curl -L -o lifeman/lifeman https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman/releases/download/v0.2/lifeman && chmod +x lifeman/lifeman
